title: ninane nambi
sahitya:
,, ninnane nambi de- | nu enna salahay ||



ya ninnane nambi de- | nu enna salahayya ||



nee enna guNa dOshaga | La eNNisa bEdayya ||



(ninnane)







anupallavi 







,,aasa yembudu ajana | ,,lOgakke muttudidE ||



aasa yembudu ajana | ,,lOgakke muttudidE ||



,,pEsaradE streeya rO- | Lu buddhi enge ||



(ninnane)







caraNam







,,,vaasu dEvane ninna | 



,,,dhiyaana maaDidava nalla ||



,,,kEsavaa enna | 



,,,klEsagaLa biDisayya ||



,,,ee daredili gaLede- |



nO indirEsanE kaa- ||



la bheedanaagadE yama- |



gE agnyaanadi ||



,,maade sisuvanu karedu |



,,mannisoova teranande  ||



,,dhaata purandara vithala



salahO dayamaadi ||



(ninnane)
